We are delighted that you are planning to join us for UK Black Business Week

There is so much happening ahead of the main event on Saturday 18 October and we want you to get the best outcomes. You can book specific events, opt for parties only or get yourself a VIP experience with an access-all-areas Premium Week Pass. It’s your choice.

If you need more information about a particular event before making your booking, take a look at the Events page.

NB Onsite prices go live week commencing Monday 13th October 2025
Children under 12 are admitted free of charge when accompanied by a paying adult.
£2 booking fee applies for each event, both online and onsite.
